nodes.text: Imperial Pay Station RMH-1973 was a pay station operated by the Imperial Treasury Department of the reconstituted Sith Empire. Shortly after 3650 BBY, the criminals Beryl Thorne and Risha Drayen orchestrated an armed heist of the pay station. The heist went sour, though, resulting in Thorne's capture, and the Treasury Department issued a 1,000,000 bounty on "Risha Xanthous," the alias that Drayen was using at the time.

Pay Station RMH-1973 was first mentioned in the conversation "Restless Spirits" with the Smuggler companion character Risha Drayen in Star Wars: The Old Republic a video game released by BioWare in 2011. The 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia expanded on the heist and named the pay station.
